edu.rpi.tw.data.rdf.sesame.query

Class QueryletProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rpi.tw.data.rdf.sesame.query.QueryletProcessor

  • public class QueryletProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Execute queries against a Repository according to given Querylets.

      • processQueries

        public static int processQueries(org.openrdf.repository.Repository repository,
                 IterableQuerylet handler)
        Deprecated. use processQuery(repository, Querylet)
        Process queries from 'querylet' until !querylet.hasNext() TODO: This should go away once processQuery(Repository,Querylet) handles IterableQuerylets correctly.
        Parameters:
        repository - - the repository against which to query.
        querylet - - the querylet from which to get queries to execute.
        Returns:
        the number of results from all queries executed.

      • processQuery

        public static int processQuery(org.openrdf.repository.Repository repository,
               Querylet querylet)
        Process query(ies) from 'querylet'. If querylet is iterable, process until !querylet.hasNext(). If querylet is a plain old querylet, do the one query. TODO: This method should handle instances of Querylet AND IterableQuerylet and loop if IterableQuerylet. Current hack fix now is a differently-named method processQueries(Repository,IterableQuerylet).
        Parameters:
        repository - - the repository against which to query.
        querylet - - the querylet from which to get queries to execute.
        Returns:
        the number of results from all queries executed.

      • composeQuery

        public static java.lang.String composeQuery(java.lang.String prefixes,
                            java.lang.String select,
                            org.openrdf.model.Resource context,
                            java.lang.String graphPattern,
                            java.lang.String orderBy,
                            java.lang.String limitTo)
        Parameters:
        prefixes - - prefixes of a SPARQL query string.
        select - - select of a SPARQL query string.
        context - - context/named graph of a SPARQL query string.
        graphPattern - - where of a SPARQL query string.
        orderBy - - order by of a SPARQL query string.
        limit - - limit of a SPARQL query string.
        Returns:
        A concatenation of all arguments with a few tidbits of syntax logic.

      • composeQuery

        Returns:
